full_text: B(6) On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:20 PM, Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> wrote: How do they have this info? Unbelievable. https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/08/10/report-prison-guards-skipped-mandatory-checks-before-jeffrey-epsteins-death/ Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

additional_notes: The document appears to be a screenshot of an email or a message. The text is mostly printed, with some redacted information marked as (b)(6) and (b)(7)(C). The document number is present in the footer.
